name: Lotto Reader
description:
With this app you don't have to read the lottery numbers yourself.

Controls

In the beginning you have to decide what is the smallest number and what is the largest. Then you have to enter how long you have between the numbers. Then you can press the Play Button and the app will get a random number.

Speech

The app also reads the numbers, but only in German and only up to the number 100. After the number 100, a small text is simply displayed, which says that there is no audio for the number. If I don't understand German you can simply mute the sound.

But now have fun with this app.
